name: Red Riding Hood - Blockmesh
description:
Play the story of the Little Red Riding Hood, as the Wolf in the year 2099. Hunt down Red and her Gang in this short immersive-sim inspired level. 

Feedback welcome!

THIS PROJECT IS A BLOCKMESH OF A LEVEL AND SUBJECT TO SOME ISSUES

Controls:

WASD - Walk

F - Interact

C - Crouch

Q/E - Lean
